languages.text: {n}Взгляд Наместника становится стеклянным, зрачки — словно пара стволов.{/n} "Это было бы нежелательно. Мне будет трудно убедить почтенного Каллигоса Винтерскейла, что мои распоряжения были не личными прихотями, а приказами некоего Вольного Торговца, прибывшего на станцию инкогнито. На месте почтенного Винтерскейла, покровительствовавшего Футфолу много десятилетий, я бы не поверил в это ни на секунду".

{n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Наместника становится стеклянным, зрачки — словно пара стволов.{/n} "Это было бы нежелательно. Мне будет трудно убедить почтенного Каллигоса Винтерскейла, что мои распоряжения были не личными прихотями, а приказами некоего Вольного Торговца, прибывшего на станцию инкогнито. На месте почтенного Винтерскейла, покровительствовавшего Футфолу много десятилетий, я бы не поверил в это ни на секунду".

It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

{n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

{n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

languages.text: {n}その瞳は曇り、瞳孔はまるで銃身のようだ。{/n}「それはよろしくないな。何十年もフットフォールを支援してきた由緒正しいカリゴス・ウィンタースケール氏に、私の行動が個人的な気まぐれではなく、お忍びでステーションにやって来た自由開拓者の命令であると説得するのは難しい。同じ立場なら、一瞬たりとも信じられないな」
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}その瞳は曇り、瞳孔はまるで銃身のようだ。{/n}「それはよろしくないな。何十年もフットフォールを支援してきた由緒正しいカリゴス・ウィンタースケール氏に、私の行動が個人的な気まぐれではなく、お忍びでステーションにやって来た自由開拓者の命令であると説得するのは難しい。同じ立場なら、一瞬たりとも信じられないな」

languages.text: {n}他的目光变得呆滞，瞳孔仿佛一对枪管。{/n}“这恐怕就太不可取了。到时候，我恐怕很难说服尊贵的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，落脚港来几十年的赞助人。我很难让他相信，我的行为并不是个人的一时兴起，而是某位匿名来到落脚港的行商浪人的命令。如果换做是我，我一个字都不会信。”
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的目光变得呆滞，瞳孔仿佛一对枪管。{/n}“这恐怕就太不可取了。到时候，我恐怕很难说服尊贵的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，落脚港来几十年的赞助人。我很难让他相信，我的行为并不是个人的一时兴起，而是某位匿名来到落脚港的行商浪人的命令。如果换做是我，我一个字都不会信。”

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos se tornan vidriosos y sus pupilas se asemejan a los cañones de una pistola.{/n} «No sería lo más ideal, desde luego. Me resultará difícil convencer al admirable Calligos Winterscale, patrón de Paso desde hace décadas, de que mis acciones no fueron caprichos personales, sino órdenes de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente que llegó a la estación de incógnito. Si fuera yo, no daría crédito alguno».
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos se tornan vidriosos y sus pupilas se asemejan a los cañones de una pistola.{/n} «No sería lo más ideal, desde luego. Me resultará difícil convencer al admirable Calligos Winterscale, patrón de Paso desde hace décadas, de que mis acciones no fueron caprichos personales, sino órdenes de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente que llegó a la estación de incógnito. Si fuera yo, no daría crédito alguno».

languages.text: {n}Son regard devient vitreux et ses pupilles vous fixent comme deux petits canons de revolver.{/n} « Je vous le déconseille vivement. J'aurais le plus grand mal à convaincre le vénérable Calligos Winterscale, notre protecteur de longue date, que mes actions n'étaient pas de simples lubies personnelles, mais les ordres d'{mf|un libre-marchand arrivé|une libre-marchande arrivée} incognito dans la station. À sa place, je n'en croirais pas un traître mot. »
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son regard devient vitreux et ses pupilles vous fixent comme deux petits canons de revolver.{/n} « Je vous le déconseille vivement. J'aurais le plus grand mal à convaincre le vénérable Calligos Winterscale, notre protecteur de longue date, que mes actions n'étaient pas de simples lubies personnelles, mais les ordres d'{mf|un libre-marchand arrivé|une libre-marchande arrivée} incognito dans la station. À sa place, je n'en croirais pas un traître mot. »

languages.text: {n}Sein Blick wird glasig, und seine Pupillen erinnern an zwei Pistolenläufe.{/n} "Das wäre nicht wünschenswert. Es wäre schwierig für mich, den bedeutenden Calligos Winterzunder, Gönner von Footfall über viele Jahrzehnte, davon zu überzeugen, dass mein Handeln keiner persönlichen Laune entstammte, sondern den Befehlen {mf|des Freihändlers folgte, der|der Freihändlerin folgte, die} inkognito auf der Station eingetroffen war. Ich würde es keine Sekunde lang glauben."
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Blick wird glasig, und seine Pupillen erinnern an zwei Pistolenläufe.{/n} "Das wäre nicht wünschenswert. Es wäre schwierig für mich, den bedeutenden Calligos Winterzunder, Gönner von Footfall über viele Jahrzehnte, davon zu überzeugen, dass mein Handeln keiner persönlichen Laune entstammte, sondern den Befehlen {mf|des Freihändlers folgte, der|der Freihändlerin folgte, die} inkognito auf der Station eingetroffen war. Ich würde es keine Sekunde lang glauben."

languages.text: {n}Gözleri cam gibi oluyor, göz bebekleri de bir çift silah namlusunu andırıyor.{/n} "İstenmeyen bir durum olurdu. Onlarca yıldır Binliman'ın hamisi olan saygıdeğer Calligos Winterscale'i, eylemlerimi aklıma estiği için değil de istasyona tebdilikıyafet gelen bir Hür Tacir'in emriyle gerçekleştirdiğime ikna etmek benim için zor olacak. Kendisinin yerinde olsam tek kelimesine inanmazdım."
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes turn glassy, the pupils resembling a pair of gun barrels.{/n} "That would be undesirable. It will be difficult for me to convince the venerable Calligos Winterscale, a patron of Footfall for many decades, that my actions were not personal whims, but rather the orders of some Rogue Trader who arrived on the station incognito. If it were me, I would not believe it for a second."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözleri cam gibi oluyor, göz bebekleri ise bir çift silah namlusunu andırıyor.{/n} "İstenmeyen bir durum olurdu. Onlarca yıldır Binliman'ın patronu olan muhterem Calligos Winterscale'i eylemlerimi kişisel kaprisler değil de istasyona tebdilikıyafet gelen bir Hür Tacirin emriyle gerçekleştirdiğime ikna etmek benim için zor olacak. Yerinde olsam tek kelimesine inanmazdım."
